artist: Takehisa Yumeji; Senow; Music composed by Franz Schubert; Lyrics composed by Heinrich Heine
creditline: Gift of Julia Meech in honor of Matthew Welch
description: folded page with image on front of standing lady in profile with long red hair, wearing a long green dress and black cap, holding a bowl of fruit; two pages of music for piano and solo voice; Japanese text on back
title: "Her Portarit"
